评论详情: I love this top! It’s good quality and feels soft against the skin. I like the oversized fit and the hood. However, it is sheer. I have to wear a tank top or shirt underneath it. I ordered navy and it looks like the color pictured. I’m 6’ 193 lbs and a large fits me perfectly.

评论概述: Looked and felt exactly as expected.
评论详情: This is a super cute top. It arrived. The color was accurate, and the sizing was true to size. Love it!
I loved the bright color and the mesh weave which makes it light enough to wear something underneath.  My only complaint is that the sleeves are quite long but not a deal breaker.

I LOVE THIS TOP!!!! Trust me when I say that it’s so versatile! Throw it together with a pair of jeans, leggings, sweats and it dresses up your outfit! I ordered a large because I wanted it to be a bit roomy. The quality of the material is really really nice!! It’s a waffle design and not thin material. It wears nicely and hangs over areas that you might want to cover up. The sleeves have a little cap at the end so if you needed to pull them up, the will stay up. It’s really a darling top and I can’t say enough about it. I don’t put mine in the dryer but it’s a preferred choice. It’s somewhat a heavier lifting top, meaning…it’s not cheaply made which is why it feels a bit heavier material than others. I ordered the apricot which came in a more of a creamy look than what the photo shows. All in all, the top is good quality material and I love it and so will you!

评论概述: Nice but not worth the money
评论详情: Soft, but a little flimsy,  sleeves long but the shirt was a little short I’m 5’8. Again nice but not worth $40 bucks w/tax etc.
Love the color and fit! Looks great with jeans or leggings. I wear a long sleeve shirt under for added warmth.

I really love my pullover. I get so many complements on not only the color but how it looks so comfy, and it is. Waffle design is a little see through so I wear a tank or cami under it. Fits well and stays in shape after washing. No shrinking so buy to your size. It is a loose fit, as you can see in the product photo, so take that into consideration. Meaning I wouldn't size up. Material in average. Not scratchy at all, which is nice. I have another in off white and get just as many complements each time I wear it.
MEDIUM: This top is very cute and sort of long so great to wear with skinny jeans or leggings.  The material/netting is thin so you would need to wear an undershirt in cold weather.

I really like this shirt however, I am having way too much trouble with Amazon's deliveries since Christmas.  They sent me a message that an item was undeliverable then the next day I received it in the mail.  The shirt I received today was due for delivery on the 17 th through the 22nd.  I do not know what has happened with amazon deliveries but it is not good.  I order quite a bit from Amazon and only since Christmas has all these problems started.
I like the look and fit, but the loose weave makes this less warm than it looks like it should be. I have to wear a shirt under it.
Love this sweater. It’s extremely comfortable. The only reason I gave it a 4 is because I have a few places that are snagged. I’m extremely careful when wearing this and still got them.
I was pleasantly surprised when this shirt arrived. It looks just as presented in the advertising. My only complaint would be it’s a bit thin. My daughter loves it!
I love everything about this hoodie sweater! It's a perfect fit  and very comfortable. You will need to wear a cami with it as it is  a mesh material but it is a tight mesh.
Picture shows a creamer white. But in person, it is stark bright white.

I was pleasantly surprised with this item.  Color was accurate, extremely comfortable to wear.  Finishes a casual outfit perfectly, whether it is yoga pants or jeans.  Very happy and will order more colors.
I love the color! It's soft and comfy. But even though I bought an XXl it doesn't fully cover my butt so I can't wear it with leggings.
I like this shirt with a vest and jeans. It is a heavier shirt and does run a little bit big. Very nice!

评论概述: Size chart is true to size
评论详情: Super cute. Color is as shown. Size chart is true to size. Would definitely buy another in a Different color

I really like the weave and feel of this sweater shirt, A+ on that but I didnt give it 5 stars because from the pics I thought it would cover my butt to wear with leggings and it does not. I bought large and I am 5'8". In the model pic it does seem like it would cover.
Love it.  Defintely not a warm sweater, but layered it is great.  I believe it is meant to be layered due to the waffle material.  I bought a large, Im 5'7 and 130 pounds.

I bought this in Blue and am pretty pleased with it overall. It is a sweater-type material (not sweatshirt), it is rather thin, so some may want to wear a cami underneath. If you prefer a looser/oversize fit, I would recommend going one size bigger, otherwise if prefer a more slim fit, I would say it is TTS.
This is a very comfortable top. It is made of a light weight waffle knit, not particularly heavy. I ordered an XL, think it runs large. I got the sage/light green.
Absolutely Love the Sweater!!!!! I have had Many compliments
Fit, color, and weight of fabric... All excellent. Love this shirt.
The sweater is made of Quality material and beautifully made. I have gotten many compliments.  It is also very comfortable.
I love this sweater! It’s so sexy and warm
Very comfortable and stylish. Looks like it does in the images advertised.
I get a lot of compliments on this when I wear it.
Really well made and cute!!
I like the waffle-like fabric. I also like the color & softness. I would have liked it to be a bit larger. I will order a size larger if I purchase another one.

Just received this shirt today, so haven't washed it yet. From 1st impression, I wasn't expecting it to be so thin. As you can see in my last photo it's VERY sheer, almost like a "net" (if that makes sense). Almost seems like more of a bathing suit cover than a sweater/sweatshirt. It will be ok for fall to layer with another shirt, but if you plan to wear it alone, it will most definitely NOT provide any warmth. Would be nice in warmer weather with a tank top underneath. That said, I'll probably keep it because I don't own anything like it and don't feel like returning it. For reference, I'm 5'6" and I ordered size L, which fits oversized.
Love this shirt. I get all kinds of compliments on it. It's very warm and comfortable.
This top is so nice. I love it!!!
I love this top and I got a small and it's huge on me. I wish they had an extra small but I still love it.
Love the color, fits well, it is light weight. But works well with a long sleeve tshirt under it

I wish that it was a bit longer other than that it is nice.
Purchased 1 for my granddaughter and one for me. I wear a tank underneath.  True to size. Great material.

I bought this shirt because I needed something that would look and feel like a sweater, yet not as bulky. I only based myself on looks and took a chance but I'm glad that I did. This shirt is super soft , yet very resilient to a harsh user such as a mom who is always on the run. And just because it's thin, don't assume ! Only buy if you like truly warm arms . Comfort and looks came together with this item.

评论概述: Cozy and Cute – My New Favorite Hoodie!
评论详情: Love this hoodie! It’s super comfy, the waffle knit feels so soft, and the button detail makes it extra cute. Perfect for lounging or running errands. Definitely my new go-to!

The color and design of this fall sweater is just what i wanted.  Right now, it's been too hot to wear since most days have been in the 90's.  First colder day, this should be the first item I look for.  Some fall days this sweater with a tee shirt under it will be all you need until the temperatures drop into the 40's.

评论概述: Not as long as pictured.  Not a “tunic length”.
评论详情: Not as long as pictured. I’m only 5’4” and this hits just below the navel. Picture appears to have it rest at thigh level. I ordered a medium. It is also a little thinner than the average waffle weave. Color as depicted. Will keep but would not order again and am disappointed.
Loved it….Was the right size.

I bought the Apricot color of the waffle knit. I was disappointed when I tried it on and you could see through it. It's comfy and perfect for the Fall weather. I will be returning this and purchase a darker color.

This shirt makes me feel like I should be at the beach for a sunset. It’s the perfect fit and the white is a bright white. I wish it was just a tiny bit thicker because you can see my bra right through it. But it’s super cute. The apricot probably would’ve been a better choice.
Liked the fit & the material
I love it and even ordered another color. It fits well and easy to wear.
